Section.name: About VIT- AP
Section.description:
VIT AP University (VIT AP) is a private university that was established in 2017 and is situated in Amaravati, Andhra Pradesh. The university offers various UG, PG, and Ph.D. courses in Engineering, Management, Commerce, etc. Admission to VIT AP is done on the basis of marks obtained in the entrance examinations like VITEEE, VITMEE, VITREE, etc. The university was established as a sister institute of Vellore Institute of Technology (VIT) whose placement stats have been recorded in the Limca book of records for the highest number of recruitments through placements done from a single institution by IT sector companies for 7 years.
As per the latest statistics available on the official website, VIT AP Highest Package offered stands at 27 LPA whereas the average package stands at INR 14.43 LPA. Some of the major recruiters are Amazon, Microsoft, DE Shaw & Co., Morgan Stanley, JP Morgan, Cisco etc

Ques. Are candidates appearing for Improvement/Privately also eligible to apply for VITEEE?
Ans. Yes. They are eligible to apply for VITEEE and should produce their marks sheet at the time of counseling.
Ques. What is the application form fee at VIT AP?
Ans. The application fee is INR 1150 for the online application and 1050 for the app.
Ques. What is the credit system followed by VIT AP?
Ans. VIT AP follows a Fully flexible Credit System. In a Fully Flexible Credit System (FFCS), a candidate has the complete freedom to tailor their full course, as they want in the credit base.
Ques. What is the closing date for the issue of applications at VIT AP?
Ans. The application deadline for VITEEE 2024 is March 30, 2024, and the application is now available.
